thread.title: David Baird
thread.title_full: Japan Rail Pass reviewed by David Baird

author: David Baird
title: David Baird
text: I visit Japan regularly for the great snow but this was the first time I have used a Japan Rail Card. I worked out it halved my land travel cost with rail from Tokyo - Negano, Tokyo - Fuji, Tokyo - Chugoku, Tokyo - Hiroshima and the other rail and subways. Will have it in my pocket next year.
